text: Bizibar osɨmtɨzibar ababanim kamakɨn: 20plan gera, sekelɨn vamɨra. Ezɨ 60plan sekel, minan vamɨra.45:12 Sekelɨn osɨmtɨzim, 11 gremɨn tu, ezɨ minan osɨmtɨzim, 648 gremɨn tu. Hibrun akam vezɨn kamɨn aven, “60plan sekel,” a mɨgeir puvatɨ. A ghaze, “20plan sekel, ko 25plan sekel, ko 15plan sekel.” Ezɨ kar 60plan sekel.
